GE07hv_coniu:32654: sūtas tv adhirathas tu vai HV_23.40*358:8b
GE07hv_coniu:32789: so 'nādir vāsudevaḥ śamayatu duritaṃ sarvajanmārjitaṃ vaḥ HV_1.0*15:2b
GE07hv_coniu:32912: so smi bhārgava bhadraṃ te HV_12.12c
GE07hv_coniu:32918: so haṃ tasmai namas kṛtvā HV_12.7a
GE07hv_coniu:32931: so hy āvāṃ yudhi nirjetā HV_42.29c
GE07hv_coniu:33026: strīṇāṃ dhik ceṣṭitaṃ tv iti HV_8.14*145:1b
GE07hv_coniu:33054: sthale vā yadi vā jale HV_56.37b
GE07hv_coniu:33074: sthāne tv iha bhaved doṣas HV_56.38c
GE07hv_coniu:33224: smṛtaṃ me yad idaṃ vākyaṃ HV_107.39*1174:2a
GE07hv_coniu:33258: syāt tu sāmnā bhavet prītir HV_59.61c
GE07hv_coniu:33261: syān na cānyena me vadhaḥ HV_31.43d
GE07hv_coniu:33386: svayaṃ viśīryanta tamo yathā raveḥ HV_48.18*606:6
GE07hv_coniu:33455: svasti te 'stv iti cokto vai HV_23.11a
GE07hv_coniu:33462: svasti hy evaṃ bhaved adya HV_112.49*1399:2a
GE07hv_coniu:33467: svasty astv iti stuvaṃs tatra HV_34.51*503a
GE07hv_coniu:33485: svaṃ janma karma gotraṃ vā HV_85.56*976:8a
GE07hv_coniu:33491: svaṃ vaṃśaṃ pūrvam eva hi HV_23.2b
GE07hv_coniu:33498: svādu kiṃ nv iti vijñāya HV_117.43c
GE07hv_coniu:33541: svāṃ svāṃ diśaṃ rarakṣus te HV_34.19c
GE07hv_coniu:33576: hatā māyāś ca tāḥ sarvā HV_99.44c
GE07hv_coniu:33606: hatvā keśinam unmadaṃ viṣataruṃ coddhṛtya govardhanaṃ HV_76.46*854A:4
GE07hv_coniu:33623: hatvāpi māṃ na śaktas tvaṃ HV_5.51a
GE07hv_coniu:33625: hatvā pūtānikāṃ vibhajya śakaṭaṃ bhaṅktvārjunau dānavān HV_76.46*854A:2
GE07hv_coniu:33626: hatvā māṃ naya gāvas tvam HV_113.43c
GE07hv_coniu:33845: hā dhig ity apare punaḥ HV_56.20d
GE07hv_coniu:33959: hṛtvā teṣāṃ ca karma tat HV_37.51b
